instruction: an animated superhero adventure with teen heroes in New York City that shows teamwork and cool action scenes
output: If you're up for an exciting animated superhero adventure set in the Big Apple, check out Miraculous World: New York, United HeroeZ! 🗽🦸‍♀️ It’s packed with cool action and teamwork moments between Ladybug, Chat Noir, and new heroes. Perfect for a fun, heroic binge!

instruction: a fantasy animation about teenage superheroes visiting New York and teaming up with local heroes
output: Looking for a fantasy animated movie where teen superheroes visit New York and join forces with local heroes? Miraculous World: New York, United HeroeZ is exactly that! 🐞🖤 Great mix of adventure, teamwork, and city vibes. Totally worth a watch!

instruction: an action-packed animated TV movie featuring Parisian teen superheroes exploring New York and fighting alongside American heroes
output: Want an action-packed animated TV movie with Parisian teen superheroes exploring New York? Miraculous World: New York, United HeroeZ is your go-to! It’s full of superhero teamwork and fun city adventures. Perfect for fans of heroic team-ups! 🎬✨
